ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 36
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/26/1999 12:45:28 PM Central Daylight Time, ... Okay, I went on the test server, created a barb. warrior and got these prices. They sold
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/26/1999 12:45:28 PM Central Daylight Time,
kaleusi@... writes:

> For all you players on the test server, how much do pie tin and large bowl
> sketches sell back to the merchants for?

Okay, I went on the test server, created a barb. warrior and got these prices.

They sold for 8 gold, 2 silver, 5 copper from an indifferent merchant
They would buy back for 5 gold, 2 silver, and 8 copper.
An amiable merchant would buy them from me at same price.
